Table of Contents

Class BoundedTissue

Namespace
Vts.MonteCarlo.Tissues
Assembly
Vts.dll

Implements ITissue. Defines a tissue geometry comprised of a layered slab bounded laterally by a TissueRegion.

public class BoundedTissue : MultiLayerTissue, ITissue
